data_table.description: Sample ID, body site where sample was obtained, analyte type, histological type, tumor status, and genotype center of participants with or without prostate cancer and involved in the "Genetic Predictors of Adverse Radiotherapy Effects (Gene-PARE)" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: GENOTYPING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted genotyping
variable.value: Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai
